body.name: Elite Gourmet EHC117M Personal Single-Serve Compact Coffee Maker Brewer Includes 14Oz. Thermal Travel Mug with Stainless Steel Interior, Compatible with Coffee Grounds, Reusable Filter, Mint
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 1 min
features: UNIVERSAL DESIGN AND WASTE REDUCING: No need for paper or plastic cups, we’ve included a 14-Oz. insulated travel mug with stainless steel interior that fits perfectly under coffee dispensers and easily fits most cup holders. Fresh coffee ready for you at a moments notice. Just Press, Brew and Go!

QUICK BREW TIME: With the Elite Gourmet personal single-serve coffee maker, you can quickly brew fresh, hot coffee at home. It’s great for “On the go” mornings or a quick pick me up to save valuable time for your busy life.

EASY ONE-TOUCH OPERATION: Enjoy hot delicious coffee fast with this stylish, compact 600-Watt coffee maker. The one-touch operation allows you to easily brew up to 14 oz. of tasty coffee at the perfect temperature without the long wait at your local coffee house.

FRESH GROUND COFFEE: Brew a cup of coffee exactly how you want it using your favorite, fresh coffee grounds. No more paper filters to buy & throw away. We’ve included a removable & reusable filter for use with coffee grounds and loose-leaf tea.

EVERYTHING YOU NEED: The Elite Gourmet Personal Single-Serve Coffee Maker has everything you need to enjoy hot fresh coffee. Comes complete with coffee maker base, travel mug, lid and reusable filter.
body.description: The Elite Gourmet Personal Single Serve Coffee Maker features a compact and sleek design that takes up limited counter space and fits into small spaces. Perfect for small spaces such as home or office kitchens, dorm rooms or recreational vehicles. Quickly and effortlessly brew your favorite coffee blend to jump start your day! The coffee maker includes a 14-Oz. insulated travel mug with stainless steel interior that fits perfectly under the dispenser so fresh coffee is always ready for you. Designed with a simple one touch push button feature and auto shut-off for easy operation. No need to stop at a local coffee house to overpay for a cup of joe just to make it through the day. Use your favorite coffee grounds in the included reusable filter so no paper filters are necessary. It’s simple, just add fresh water for each brew. Cleanup is a cinch; all removable parts and accessories are dishwasher safe. A fresh cup of coffee on the go with the Elite Gourmet Single Serve Personal Coffee Maker to start a perfect day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We were vacationing at a location that didn't provide coffee makers, so we purchased this to bring along to enjoy our coffee in the room each morning while getting ready for the day and it worked perfectly! It's small enough to pack and super convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little single-cup maker
reviews.reviewText: I got this yesterday, set it up today and made my first cup. It was very good! The cup fits perfectly underneath, the brew strength is moderate (the way I like it), and the cup keeps the coffee toasty for a solid half-an-hour, so each sip was a pleasure.I'm very happy I chose this model. Others were more expensive and *didn't* include the cup (even though the cup was in the marketing photo). I am traveling this summer, and this little pot will be a great addition. Some hosts might be delightful people, but they make a lousy cup of joe. I like knowing I don't have to depend on anyone else to get a nice, smooth, creamy cup in the morning. I also like being able to use my favorite brands of coffee without buying k-cups. Costs much less and doesn't add the plastic waste of k-cups.I found single-cup paper coffee pods here on Amazon for a reasonable price (Wolfgang Puck Brand, $8.66 for 18). Even better! An added convenience, and these coffee pods can go straight into composting.I'm trying to reduce my coffee consumption to 2 cups a day, so this little maker will help me do that. Really, the only negative I have is the unit itself looks a little cheap. Plack plastic. But for $22 I will not complain! The only thing I would like to add is some sort of storage bag or bin, so I can keep the maker, cup, coffee, mini moos and scoop in one place.I paid $22.99 for this coffee maker. A great buy, and I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: I love Elite Gourmet Single Cup Coffee Makers., They are quick, brews very well and usually will last a while if properly cleaned. I have an older one also, I have to say that one is my favorite-bigger space underneath for the mug and lid(if I just want to cover it for a moment) This newest one, the mug barely fits under it(they stored the lid inside the coffee maker. All in All-it handles making a good cup of Joe as well as my larger coffee maker. This compact maker will be going with me when I travel, no nasty hotel makers. Sometimes, the Coffee Maker seems to not be working, clean it well with a vinegar mix running through, run water through a few times to unclog anything stuck in bottom or in hose. Once I did this, my older model roar back to life :).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great inexpensive coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely loving the retro mint green color, which is what drew me to this in the first place. I had a similar black one about 15 yrs ago on my desk at the office when they started charging us to use their coffee machine, but not the coffee packets for the machine, so coffee was still free for me :). Anyway, I love that this uses ground coffee instead of those wasteful pods, comes with a reusable filter & a matching tumbler. It doesn’t take up much room & can fit in a deep desk cabinet drawer.Hubs has his home office in the garage & now he doesn’t need to schlep to the house to make his coffee. Although you need to wait till it cools down a bit before making another cup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coffee to go
reviews.reviewText: I have 3 ways to make coffee, including this. This small coffee maker does not have a drip tray, a warmer, or do ANYTHING ELSE besides quickly brew you a to-go mug of coffee. Which is EXACTLY what it's purpose is.I can choose from using 12cup coffee pot, instant coffee, or single serve to-go mug coffee maker. In that order depending how many times I hit snooze that morning. Lol.Love the mint color also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh It does the job
reviews.reviewText: To be honest I expected a little bit more from this coffee maker but you get what you pay for. The whole thing is made of cheap flimsy plastic and every time I use it, I feel like it is going to break. Also the start button is a complete mess. You have to push it very hard a couple of times just for it to turn in. And BEWARE, do not fill it up all the way with water unless you know it will all fit in your cup. It does not measure the water and will use all that you pour into it. So just a tip, fill your desired coffee cup with water first and use that to measure and pour into the basin. Otherwise, it’s a coffee maker that does the job and has a quick brewing time like advertised. Just some small cosmetic and some functional things that just isn’t my cup of tea. Regardless, I am keeping it as it is saving me much needed space in my kitchen and will make a tasty cup of warm coffee for me so I can deal with the small hassle. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Wife Loves It
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my wife so she would have a dedicated brewer for her Crio Bru. She can't and doesn't drink coffee. So her Crio Bru is her get the day started or warm-up in the evening goto.As others have noted, the included mug only keeps things warm for about half an hour. Not a problem on a commute as it were, but not if you want it hot when you get there. Like most people we have more thermal mugs around than we need, so my wife just uses one of them.That said, I knew that going in from other reviews and didn't buy the brewer for that. I got it so the wife would have her dedicated, easy-to-use and maintain, brewer. She loves it and that makes it 5 stars for me. After all, I got the gold star for getting it for her. ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for work and home
reviews.reviewText: I bought one to use at work and liked it so much I bought another to use at home. It creates near-boiling water instantly and works perfectly for both coffee and tea. The thermos is nice but you can use any mug of course. Its easy to customize the amount of water and grounds to your needs. Use a tea bag or cocoa mix in your mug or fill the washable filter with loose leaf tea or coffee grounds. It's not hard to clean but I do use a paper filter at work to save time.
Portátil. No estorba. Café rápido, limpieza sencilla

It is really nice to stop using coffee pods and return to a good,simple coffee maker.This coffee pot has a small footprint,is very easy to use and clean.It brews a good hot cup of coffee and the thermal mug is an added bonus.I am very pleased with this personal one cup coffee machine.It certainly has been a welcome addition to my coffee routine.I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: It does what its suppose to
reviews.reviewText: This single serve coffee maker is an excellent value. It does exactly what it is designed to do, preparing an excellent, piping-hot cup of coffee. My only complaint is that the opening isn't tall enough for some taller cups, but the accompanying insulated cup is just fine for around the home. If you are looking for a no-frills, minimalist coffee machine that produces great results for an unbeatable price, then I highly recommend this one.
Coffee pods are way too EXPENSIVE now!! Compact.. super easy to use. Just scoop up your favorite brand of Coffee. Machine comes with plastic filter. Press the button and your set.
